languages.text: By the end of {g|f:ce16283fbdff4a658071cc548a3bec2f}Swing Run{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.
languages.original_text: Завершая Рывок с разворотом, корабль может выбирать одно из трех направлений, а не только противоположное изначальному.

traits.locale_text: By the end of Swing Run the flagship can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.
By the end of Swing Run the flagship can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.
By the end of Swing Run the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.
By the end of Swing Run the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.

languages.text: Завершая Рывок с разворотом, корабль может выбирать одно из трех направлений, а не только противоположное изначальному.
languages.original_text: By the end of Swing Run the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.

traits.locale_text: Завершая Рывок с разворотом, {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}корабль{/g} может выбирать одно из трех направлений, а не только противоположное изначальному.
Завершая Рывок с разворотом, {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}корабль{/g} может выбирать одно из трех направлений, а не только противоположное изначальному.

languages.text: Am Ende des {g|f:ce16283fbdff4a658071cc548a3bec2f}Schleifenmanövers{/g} kann das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} seine Position aus 3 Richtungen wählen, anstatt die entgegengesetzte einzunehmen.
languages.original_text: By the end of {g|f:ce16283fbdff4a658071cc548a3bec2f}Swing Run{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.

traits.locale_text: Am Ende des Schleifenmanövers kann das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} seine Position aus 3 Richtungen wählen, anstatt die entgegengesetzte einzunehmen.

languages.text: À la fin du {g|f:ce16283fbdff4a658071cc548a3bec2f}Revirement{/g}, le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} peut choisir sa position parmi 3 directions plutôt que de prendre la position opposée.
languages.original_text: By the end of {g|f:ce16283fbdff4a658071cc548a3bec2f}Swing Run{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.

traits.locale_text: À la fin du Revirement, le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} peut choisir sa position parmi 3 directions plutôt que de prendre la position opposée.

languages.text: {g|f:ce16283fbdff4a658071cc548a3bec2f}摇摆转向{/g}结束时，{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}不再朝相反的方向前进，而是可以从三个方向中任意选择。
languages.original_text: By the end of {g|f:ce16283fbdff4a658071cc548a3bec2f}Swing Run{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.

traits.locale_text: 摇摆转向结束时，{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}不再朝相反的方向前进，而是可以从三个方向中任意选择。

languages.text: Al final de {g|f:ce16283fbdff4a658071cc548a3bec2f}Carrera de giro{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} puede elegir su posición entre 3 direcciones en lugar de tomar la opuesta.
languages.original_text: By the end of {g|f:ce16283fbdff4a658071cc548a3bec2f}Swing Run{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.

traits.locale_text: Al final de Carrera de giro, la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} puede elegir su posición entre 3 direcciones en lugar de tomar la opuesta.

languages.text: スイングランの終了時、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が位置取りを反転だけでなく3方向から選択することができるようになる。
languages.original_text: By the end of Swing Run the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.

traits.locale_text: スイングランの終了時、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が位置取りを反転だけでなく3方向から選択することができるようになる。

languages.text: {g|f:ce16283fbdff4a658071cc548a3bec2f}Tam Gaz U Dönüşü{/g}'nün sonunda {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}sancak gemisi{/g}, aksi konumu almak yerine 3 yön arasından konumunu seçebilir.
languages.original_text: By the end of {g|f:ce16283fbdff4a658071cc548a3bec2f}Swing Run{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.
